      • readWebappManifest

        public static java.util.jar.Manifest readWebappManifest(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)
                                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                                        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Reads the web application's Manifest.
        Parameters:
        servletContext - to locate the manifest file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if any I/O error was encountered while reading
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if no manifest file exists

      • readSrcalcInfo

        public static SrcalcInfo readSrcalcInfo(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)

        Reads the web application's basic information from its manifest.

        If the manifest could not be read for any reason, this method will just populate the SrcalcInfo object with some default values. This default behavior handles deployments with no manfiest, such as Tomcat running in Eclipse.

        Parameters:
        servletContext - to locate the manifest file
        Returns:
        the loaded SrcalcInfo instance
